name: Panda Baby Delum Soap
description: For generations, mothers have used the natural goodness of delum to protect and care for baby skin. Panda Baby delum baby soap with natural delum extract gently cleanses, protects and refreshes, leaving skin lovingly fragranced. Make a soapy lather and gently massage on baby's skin and rinse off. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
